_header: Merciful Queen as ye best can and may
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary, and saints; Virgin Mary, prayers to; saints, prayers to
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary and several saints — four 8-line and five 7-line stanzas

BLAru249.First Lines:
Mercyful quene as þe best kan and may after your soneOf
                    wreches take pyte send your comfort nowe on your…
BLAru249.Last Lines:
…And I schal pray the botefull kateryneTo pray for youre and
                    myn joyfull metyng
BLAru249.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         131 (1913): 40-63: 46-7.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 200-2.

CamFitz40-1950.First Lines:
Mercifull quene as ȝe best can & mayaffter ȝoure son
                    of wrechis haue pyte…
CamFitz40-1950.Last Lines:
…That he gafe ȝou with his fyrst apparenceGeyn all euyll
                    be ȝe my sure deffence
CamFitz40-1950.Note:
Added by contemporary hand; variant with 8 stanzas rhyme
                    royal.
